name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: MSB/Globe left ppl with $10Ks of debt & 0 to show for it bc they defrauded them. We took them to court & won but they appealed for yrs to avoid paying $ back. Then after the MNSupCt upheld judgment against them, they filed bankruptcy. We're still fighting.  https://t.co/Ckwc24W5kM

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: It's been a wonderful year as your Attorney General. I'm grateful to work with my colleagues to come together and ensure that you can afford your lives and live with dignity and respect. From all of us to you, Happy Holidays.  https://t.co/uyqXw7eED9

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: I carried this bill for a path to citizenship for the Liberian community for 8 straight yrs while I was in Congress. They’ve been asking for it for more than 20 yrs. I couldn’t be happier for them and for all of Minnesota that it’s finally passed.  https://t.co/3Nm7wmRyiv

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: At this time of year, ppl like to express thanks and give. But these folks repeatedly lied that all they were doing with the $ ppl donated was supporting the families of fallen police officers, when they barely did that at all. They're done now.  https://t.co/RdboqcpZpG

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: "Maybe that was the plan all along: to mire the future of Obamacare in litigation, and thus provide Republicans a lifeline... They can continue to degrade the vital protections of Obamacare without taking responsibility for repealing and replacing it."  https://t.co/z9prIz4bd5

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: The ACA court ruling yesterday got it wrong. In the short term, the ACA's still in place for folks who need it, but it could still be thrown out. I’m working with other states to uphold it for the millions of Minnesotans who count on it. We’ll take it to the Sup Ct if we have to.

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Thank you @TerriGerstein. We had an excellent conversation on workers' rights and #wagetheft. Tune into the Affording Your Life #podcast to listen to the latest episode streaming on all major podcast platforms  https://t.co/E3B7SdTMTw

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: If you're not getting every dollar you earned for every hour you worked, you might be a victim of wage theft. That's against Minnesota law. My office is enforcing the law, so if this is happening to you, contact us & we'll help.  https://t.co/jjv2iW7wBd

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: AGs from around the country & I are challenging Trump's illegal & immoral refugee order in court. @GovTimWalz is holding MN's door open for refugees. We both know MN is stronger when all ppl live with dignity & respect. We're in this together for MN.  https://t.co/9S8frKMM5d

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: 120K ppl in MN work in construction. Too many of them have their wages stolen, are denied medical care & are trafficked. This economic & moral crisis keeps ppl from being able to afford their lives & live w dignity & respect. @CTUL_TC has a new report about how we can stop it.

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: "Unpaid taxes, a home sold to a son, hundreds of thousands in unpaid bills, and vulnerable tenants whose rents were raised and leases were ignored. Those are the allegations leveled against former Ramsey County commissioner Blake Huffman."  https://t.co/ulvrKl0HMd

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Blake Huffman asked generous Minnesotans for their hard-earned $ to provide housing for vets & ppl in crisis. But he didn't follow through, broke the terms of his mission & engaged in conflicts of interest. I'm suing to hold him accountable for it.  https://t.co/A014DSq7r1

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Minnesotans believe everyone should live w dignity & respect. This includes refugees who've given back much to the state & communities that have welcomed them. That's why I’m challenging POTUS's resettlement order. It's not just illegal, it's immoral.  https://t.co/TJicCTgaYz

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: If this company harmed you, or you've been approached by another company w a similar scam, contact my office & we'll help. Everyone should be on the lookout for scams like these. Here are things to look out for:  https://t.co/VZQgc42ZFt

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: A TX co tricked Minnesotans into believing their auto warranties were about to expire, then sold them service contracts that didn't cover what they said they'd cover. We reached a settlement that bans them in MN and gets restitution for folks they harmed.  https://t.co/Kp33lzY78c

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: 100+ folks showed up in Rochester bc they love their neighbors & their cmty and believe hate has no place there. That's how we'll stop it: by getting in relationship w each other & showing up for each other. That's the strength of MN.  https://t.co/RUP2U4CNVu

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Noncompete clauses are another way the economy is stacked against low-wage workers. A barista or sandwich-maker should be able to change jobs when they want to. And it's not just them: even doctors are hurt by them. Time to put a stop to them.  https://t.co/DmN8vo9utg

tweet: Integration in Ag markets is making it harder for families & farmers alike to afford their lives. When anticompetitive behavior threatened the market for school milk in MN, my office stepped in make sure this staple stays affordable for kids & families.  https://t.co/Ev9GB9eXyu

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: If CA wants to get tough, that's their right as a state. Proud that MN is one of 20+ states & cities joining CA @AGBecerra in this lawsuit. Fed govt shouldn't be able to preempt states from their own higher clean-air standards for protecting their people.   https://t.co/0naZ1z4HgU

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: 30M ppl —1 in 5 US workers — are bound by noncompete clauses. These folks can be sandwich makers, doctors, engineers,  baristas. Often they don't even know until they get another job, then get sued. Noncompetes are unfair & abusive & need to end.  https://t.co/cK2QkN45Oz

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Non-compete clauses are abusive and unnecessary no matter your job. For low-income folks, they’re a way to keep you poor.  That's why I fought them in Congress. Now I've led a coalition of 19 AGs to ask the fed govt to classify them as unfair and illegal.  https://t.co/dqkPF47Rm7

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Thx @GovTimWalz for keeping the focus on affordable insulin on Natl Diabetes Day. The price of insulin has gone up 1200% in 20 yrs. The researcher who discovered it 100 yrs ago sold the patent for $1 bc he wanted to save lives. See anything wrong here?  https://t.co/Y1czSdVI5O

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Lunch shaming HAS TO END. All children should be able to live w dignity & respect. A sure way to damage that is to shame them bc their family's struggling to afford their life, like so many MN families are. The only thing that's shameful is the shaming.  https://t.co/LpyO3auU0B

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Once again the Trump Admin is trying to break the law for their anti-immigrant agenda. I’ve already held them accountable in court for breaking the law re children in detention, public charge & due process. I’ll do it whenever they try to hurt Minnesotans.  https://t.co/gmGHKW2jwm

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Another attack on a house of worship is bad. If hate crimes are down that’s good but too agencies are reporting to be sure. We need more resources, training, legal clarity & trust. Above all we’ll only beat hate when ppl & communities connect w each other.  https://t.co/82srT3Szkl

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: It boils my blood when veterans are scammed. In 2017 the MN AGO sued one of these scams & the court ruled selling military benefits violates MN law. Scammers made $100s of M while some folks lost everything. Every state needs to throw the book at them.   https://t.co/buS3Am8qQI

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: Thanking veterans is important; caring for them even more so. name: Attorney General Keith Ellison

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: MSB/Globe took adv of ppl who just wanted to afford their lives. They marketed a program that wouldn’t lead to a job, then pocketed ppl’s $ & student loans & left them w debt and a useless degree. My office fought & won so folks can finally get $ back.   https://t.co/5e3rNQJcBk

tweet: More about this terrible rule & how we blocked it here:  https://t.co/36bTQTYKQr

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
tweet: I believe healthcare is a human right. The Trump Admin believes it’s ok for some people to get sick, suffer, or die just bc of who they are. I stepped in to protect Minnesotans & block their rule. Today we won big.  https://t.co/7sexyvsnNE

name: Attorney General Keith Ellison
